author: Crazy_Chris
title: Upgrade for 7856
review:
Overview
Year of release: 1980
Last year in catalog: 1990
Set type: supplemental
Generation (within grey era): 1.0
Predecessor (within grey era): none
Successor (within grey era): 1239

Description
This set is an upgrade for set 7856, because 7856 and 2x 7863 = 7858 and 7859.
At the end of 1984, it disappeared from the catalog. However, the 1985 service sheet shows set 1239 which has exactly the same contents.

Variants and alternate parts
In general, the remote switch exists in two different hardware variants:

  • early type, no groove at the back of the case, contacts with visible metal rings
  • later type, two-studs groove at the back of the case, contacts without visible metal rings

But it is hard to say if this set is affected by the two variants, due to its limited selling period from 1980 to 1984.

Personal opinion
Another proof of the system idea. If you started with 7856 instead of 7858/7859, you still had the chance to upgrade.
